templates.summary: アイデア比較テンプレート
templates.content: <svg viewBox="0 0 800 600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><rect x="50" y="50" width="300" height="500" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="450" y="50" width="300" height="500" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><text x="200" y="100" text-anchor="middle" font-size="24" fill="#1e40af">アイデアA</text><text x="600" y="100" text-anchor="middle" font-size="24" fill="#1e40af">アイデアB</text><rect x="75" y="150" width="250" height="80" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#93c5fd" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="75" y="250" width="250" height="80" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#93c5fd" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="75" y="350" width="250" height="80" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#93c5fd" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="475" y="150" width="250" height="80" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#93c5fd" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="475" y="250" width="250" height="80" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#93c5fd" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="475" y="350" width="250" height="80" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#93c5fd" stroke-width="2"/><text x="200" y="190" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#64748b">メリット1を入力</text><text x="200" y="290" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#64748b">メリット2を入力</text><text x="200" y="390" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#64748b">メリット3を入力</text><text x="600" y="190" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#64748b">メリット1を入力</text><text x="600" y="290" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#64748b">メリット2を入力</text><text x="600" y="390" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#64748b">メリット3を入力</text></svg>

templates.content: <svg viewBox="0 0 800 300" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><line x1="100" y1="150" x2="700" y2="150" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="4"/><circle cx="200" cy="150" r="20" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><circle cx="400" cy="150" r="20" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><circle cx="600" cy="150" r="20" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><text x="200" y="100" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#1e40af">Phase 1</text><text x="400" y="100" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#1e40af">Phase 2</text><text x="600" y="100" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#1e40af">Phase 3</text><text x="200" y="200" text-anchor="middle" font-size="12" fill="#64748b">4月完了</text><text x="400" y="200" text-anchor="middle" font-size="12" fill="#64748b">7月完了</text><text x="600" y="200" text-anchor="middle" font-size="12" fill="#64748b">10月完了</text></svg>

templates.content: <svg viewBox="0 0 800 400" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><defs><marker id="arrow" viewBox="0 0 10 10" refX="9" refY="5" markerWidth="6" markerHeight="6" orient="auto"><path d="M 0 0 L 10 5 L 0 10 z" fill="#60a5fa"/></marker></defs><line x1="100" y1="200" x2="700" y2="200" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="600" y="150" width="100" height="100" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="350" y="150" width="100" height="100" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="100" y="150" width="100" height="100" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><line x1="200" y1="200" x2="350" y2="200" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)"/><line x1="450" y1="200" x2="600" y2="200" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)"/><text x="650" y="200" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#1e40af">理想の姿</text><text x="400" y="200" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#1e40af">中間目標</text><text x="150" y="200" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#1e40af">現在</text></svg>

templates.summary: 決定フローテンプレート
templates.content: <svg viewBox="0 0 800 600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><defs><marker id="arrow" viewBox="0 0 10 10" refX="9" refY="5" markerWidth="6" markerHeight="6" orient="auto"><path d="M 0 0 L 10 5 L 0 10 z" fill="#60a5fa"/></marker></defs><rect x="350" y="50" width="100" height="60" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><path d="M 400 200 L 450 300 L 350 300 Z" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="200" y="350" width="100" height="60" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="500" y="350" width="100" height="60" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><line x1="400" y1="110" x2="400" y2="200" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)"/><line x1="350" y1="300" x2="250" y2="350" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)"/><line x1="450" y1="300" x2="550" y2="350" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)"/><text x="400" y="85" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#64748b">開始</text><text x="400" y="240" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#64748b">判断</text><text x="250" y="385" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#64748b">Yes</text><text x="550" y="385" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#64748b">No</text></svg>

templates.summary: 条件分岐フローチャートテンプレート
templates.content: <svg viewBox="0 0 800 600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><defs><marker id="arrow" viewBox="0 0 10 10" refX="9" refY="5" markerWidth="6" markerHeight="6" orient="auto"><path d="M 0 0 L 10 5 L 0 10 z" fill="#60a5fa"/></marker></defs><rect x="350" y="50" width="100" height="60" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><path d="M 350 200 L 450 200 L 400 260 Z" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="200" y="300" width="100" height="60" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="500" y="300" width="100" height="60" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><line x1="400" y1="110" x2="400" y2="200" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)"/><line x1="400" y1="260" x2="250" y2="300" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)"/><line x1="400" y1="260" x2="550" y2="300" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)"/><text x="400" y="80" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#64748b">開始</text><text x="400" y="220" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#64748b">条件</text><text x="250" y="340" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#64748b">Yes処理</text><text x="550" y="340" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#64748b">No処理</text></svg>

templates.summary: サイクル型フローチャートテンプレート
templates.content: <svg viewBox="0 0 800 600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><defs><marker id="arrow" viewBox="0 0 10 10" refX="9" refY="5" markerWidth="6" markerHeight="6" orient="auto"><path d="M 0 0 L 10 5 L 0 10 z" fill="#60a5fa"/></marker></defs><circle cx="400" cy="300" r="200" fill="none" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="350" y="150" width="100" height="50" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="550" y="275" width="100" height="50" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="350" y="400" width="100" height="50" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="150" y="275" width="100" height="50" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><path d="M 450 175 A 200 200 0 0 1 550 275" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)" fill="none"/><path d="M 600 325 A 200 200 0 0 1 450 400" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)" fill="none"/><path d="M 350 425 A 200 200 0 0 1 150 325" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)" fill="none"/><path d="M 150 275 A 200 200 0 0 1 350 175" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)" fill="none"/><text x="400" y="175" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#64748b">計画</text><text x="600" y="300" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#64748b">実行</text><text x="400" y="425" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#64748b">評価</text><text x="200" y="300" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#64748b">改善</text></svg>

templates.summary: 階層ピラミッドテンプレート
templates.content: <svg viewBox="0 0 800 600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M 400 50 L 600 200 L 200 200 Z" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><path d="M 200 200 L 600 200 L 700 400 L 100 400 Z" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><path d="M 100 400 L 700 400 L 800 600 L 0 600 Z" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><text x="400" y="150" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#1e40af">最重要</text><text x="400" y="300" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#1e40af">重要</text><text x="400" y="500" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#1e40af">通常</text></svg>

templates.summary: 分離型ベン図テンプレート
templates.content: <svg viewBox="0 0 800 400" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><circle cx="250" cy="200" r="120" fill="#f0f9ff" fill-opacity="0.5" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><circle cx="550" cy="200" r="120" fill="#f0f9ff" fill-opacity="0.5" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><text x="250" y="200" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#1e40af">グループA</text><text x="550" y="200" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#1e40af">グループB</text><line x1="370" y1="200" x2="430" y2="200" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/><text x="400" y="180" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#64748b">相違点</text></svg>
